name: passover
description:
passover

+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+

WASD to move, mouse to view camera

made in 3 days using BitsyColor3d

+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+

i've been sick for a while and have sorely missed sitting at my desk for 3d game development. when i found out about bitsy3d and that it can be run on my school laptop while i recover in bed, i couldn't resist in joining a game jam, even though i joined late and could only work on it in segments as i recover.

passover is on april 5th and i am excited to join my family in this tradition. we are not jewish but believe in following and studying the bible, and passover is one of the feasts we are commanded to observe. because it often circulates around the topic of unfermented things, i thought it was perfect timing for this theme haha
